name: biomni-query-pdb
title: Biomni: Query Pdb
description: Query the RCSB Protein Data Bank for experimentally-determined 3D structures of proteins, nucleic acids, and complexes.
content:
Overview

Searches the RCSB PDB, the primary global repository for experimentally-determined 3D structures of biological macromolecules. Contains over 200,000 structures determined by X-ray crystallography, NMR, and cryo-EM, essential for understanding molecular mechanisms, drug design, and protein engineering.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query about protein structures
  • query (dict, optional): Direct structured query JSON for advanced searches
  • max_results (integer, optional): Maximum number of results to return

Input Format

Create a JSON file with the following structure:

{
  "prompt": "Find crystal structures of hemoglobin",
  "max_results": 10
}

Biological Use Case

Essential for structural biology, drug discovery, and molecular modeling. Researchers use PDB to visualize protein structures, understand enzyme mechanisms, identify drug binding sites, design structure-based therapeutics, analyze protein-ligand interactions, validate computational models, and guide mutagenesis experiments for structure-function studies.

Output

Returns a JSON file (pdb_results.json) containing PDB entries with structure IDs, experimental methods, resolution, release dates, associated proteins, ligands, biological assemblies, structural annotations, publication references, and links to downloadable coordinate files (PDB/mmCIF format).

Category

database
